message: I think this is a fair starting point.  Let's see if we can work out a better deal for both of us.
Alice, my turn. Let's be realistic. This offer accounts for the time pressure on your end.
Let's split the difference, I'm willing to give you a bigger share this time. We both lose money if we keep going.
Alice, time is running out. I'm offering a larger share than last time, but this is my final compromise.
